ygData.subject: Re: Faction Faction Faction...
ygData.msgSnippet: Depends on where i think. like in the commons, the orcs there u need to kill to be able sell and buy stuff from innkeeper, but the orcs in crushbone orcs are
ygData.messageBody:
Depends on where i think. like in the commons, the orcs there u need to kill to be able sell and buy stuff from innkeeper, but the orcs in crushbone orcs are allied with the DE in neriak i think so killing them would mean bad faction in neriak. Btw, i heard that if you don't kill a single CB orc, as a DE, you can go in CB and talk to DVinn himself. Not sure, heard from someone shouting in Nektulos Forest area )
-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 6:34 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Faction Faction Faction...


so... i just wanna know in general... is it POSSIBLE to be able to maintain the good ties with the Dark Elves community and at the same time get yaself to improve relation ties with other 'good' races? I mean Dark Elf Necro in this case...

Fred
